TEXT.TITLE: COMMONWEALTH EDISON <CWE> FILES DEBT OFFER
TEXT.BODY: Commonwealth Edison Co filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission for the sale of 375 mln dlrs in first mortgage bonds. It said the proceedings would be used to discharge or refund outstanding obligations. No underwriter was named. Reuter
